title: Thibau Nys Blew up 2024, Now He’s Aiming for More: ‘I’m Doing a Good Job, but I Want to Do It in Even Bigger Races’
content:
Belgian sensation sees sky as the limit as he prepares to debut a season loaded with ambition in the Ardennes and a hotly anticipated grand tour debut.

Read the full article at Thibau Nys Blew up 2024, Now He’s Aiming for More: ‘I’m Doing a Good Job, but I Want to Do It in Even Bigger Races’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
